name: 9 Lives To Escape
summary: A hardcore pixel-art platformer where you control a cat with 9 lives per level. Dodge deadly traps, survive precision jumps, and restart from scratch if you fail. Master fast-paced challenges and escape â€” or lose all your lives trying.

name: 9 Lives
summary: Step into a noir-inspired world of mystery, humor, and the supernatural in 9 Lives, a visual novel where your choices shape the story. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and navigate branching dialogue in a stunning black-and-white art style. Will you crack the case or get lost in the shadows?

name: 9 Lives 9 Millimeters
summary: Take on waves of enemies alone or with friends, up to 4 players. Use a myriad of armed cats to defend yourself and customers in this tower defense style game. Keep pouring coffee and shaking eggs out of chickens as the onslaught progresses to earn extra cash!

name: 9Lives Arena
summary: 9lives Arena is a competitive online RPG focused on skill based one versus one PvP featuring permadeath, persistent progression, resource gathering, item crafting and the world's first online/offline companion, Ooogy, that works for you 24/7.

name: 9 Lives to Defend
summary: Face a pest infestation and survive until Loki's parents return from their trip! Defend the house with your 9 lives. Choose upgrades, and play with different versions of Loki, with unique weapons and abilities to fight this war ^.^

name: 9 Lives
summary:
Bob Cat has a girl in every town, but there is one who's special to his heart; Claudette cat. Claudette has the biggest eyes you've ever seen and Bob aims to make her his queen.

Off Bob goes to sing his night song, but arrives just in time to see his beloved being whisked away in a net by two of the mad Scientist's men. What horrendous experiments will the Scientist carry out on old cutie paws? Can Bob save her in time?

name: 9 Lives
summary: After living on a crisis striken city, you receive a letter inviting you to join a cat rescue at the Muur Islands. Grow medicinal plants, craft medicine, diagnose symptoms, establish relationships with the island's inhabitants, explore the island and untangle every mystery it has to offer.
